import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { getLocal } from '../../helpers/auth' import { useActionData, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Login from '../login/Login' import jwtDecode from 'jwt-decode' import axios from 'axios' import { baseUrl } from '../../api/api' function UserProfile() { const history = useNavigate() const [user, setUser] = useState('') const [profile_img, setImage] = useState() const response = getLocal(); const decoded = jwtDecode(response) async function getUser() { const user = await axios.get(`${baseUrl}user-detail/${decoded.user_id}/`) setUser(user.data) } const UserUpdate = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() async function updateUser() { const user = await axios.put(`${baseUrl}user-detail/${decoded.user_id}/`).then(res => { console.log(user); }) } const closeButton = document.querySelector('.btn-secondary[data-bs-dismiss="modal"]'); closeButton.click(); } useEffect(() => { if (!response) { history('/') } getUser() }, []) return (
{user?.username}
Information
Email

{user?.email}

Phone

123 456 789

Update Profile

{ if(e.target.value[0] != null) setImage(e.target.files[0])}} />

) } export default UserProfile
